document_data.mainbody:
Sheera bint Tanar was an advisor to the Sheikh of Tajar in the Pearl Cities of Zakhara in 1367 DR.
As a skilled shair, Sheera served as Sheikh Ali al-Hadds magical advisor. She maintained Tajars strong relationships with the jann and monitored all genie activity within the city.
Sheera was actually the Sheikhs daughter, though he had not publicly recognized her. Her mother was an elven courtesan in the Sheikhs court.
